column1: Smoque BBQ////We've been meaning to try Smoque since it opened last year
column2: and finally made the trek up to Pulaski. Maybe it's that my expectations were too high
column3: after hearing such great reviews and seeing it on Diners
column5: and Dives. Maybe it's that I don't love barbecue sauce in general. Whatever it is
column6: we left disappointed. I thought the macaroni and cheese and the fries were excellent. I loved the way the place was run - order at the counter
column7: then see Barry to get seated. Everyone was super friendly - the woman in front of us in line talked us through what she thought were the best parts of the menu.
